operators.angelina: Reliable slow to many enemies in range during skill
operators.bibeak: Can kind of stunlock low atk speed enemies
operators.mostima: Massive slow but at a really high SP cost
operators.nightmare: Don't use her because of this
operators.w: Slight crowd control with mine stuns
operators.suzuran: Good on Skill 3, Very good on Skill 2
operators.ch_en_the_holungday: A small bonus to what she does
operators.shu: Teleporting unlimited numbers of enemies back
operators.tragodia: S1 bind, S2 controlling enemies, and S3 locking them in place
